user_query: I'm planning to invest in the cryptocurrency market and I need a comprehensive overview.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest information on all cryptocurrencies including name, slug, icon class, symbol, price, market cap, 24-hour volume, total volume, change in the last 24 hours, and change in the last 7 days.
Fetch the forex information for the USD-EUR pair.
Fetch the performance details of the forex majors.
Fetch the latest data for the Saudi Aramco equity.
